content: japanese knot produce bag i grew up carrying my own grocery bags but for some reason it never clicked that i could replace those flimsy plastic bags from the produce section well it finally did and i ve been making these little things for a while now they work up in no time depending on the size they weigh between 5 and 19 grams and i always have 3 or 4 of them balled up in my grocery bag machine washable daaahling it s a new feature no more plastic bags please copy and pass this pattern around freely spread the word make them for your non- crocheting friends whaaat and let s get rid of as many plastic bags as we can © 2019 the yarner creative commons some rights reserved 1 materials ~ 20g of crochet cotton size 10 3mm hook 1 lockable stitch marker/progress keeper yarn needle for darning in ends glossary sts - stitches single_crochet - single_crochet chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch m - marker pm - place marker directions bottom start with a magic loop image google crochet magic loop for a lot of different instructions round 1 6 single_crochet in loop pull loop tight pm for beginning of round = 6 sts round 2 2sc in every single_crochet if you crochet over your end you won t have to darn it in later =12sts round 3 2sc in every single_crochet = 24 sts round 4 ch1 single_crochet in every st round 5 ch2 single_crochet in every gap round 6 chain 4 single_crochet in every gap © 2019 the yarner creative commons some rights reserved 2 body rds 1-25 chain 6 single_crochet in every gap round 26 chain 4 single_crochet in every gap round 27 3sc in gap 1sc in single_crochet to end =96 sts round 28 single_crochet to end handles round 1 chain 50 skip 26 single_crochet 30 chain 10 skip 10 single_crochet 30 round 2 single_crochet to end slip_stitch break yarn and pull end through loop on hook darn in end s © 2019 the yarner creative commons some rights reserved 3 notes you can of course make the body of this bag as long or as short as you want for an overall smaller bag with a tighter mesh try a size 20 crochet thread with a 2mm hook © 2019 the yarner creative commons some rights reserved 4
